utterances: Search crews have recovered part of the tail section of Air France 447, putting investigators a little closer to understanding what brought down the Airbus as it flew across the Atlantic from Rio de Janeiro to Paris.

In the past, there have been instances, particularly on the A330 and the A340, of those sensors becoming blocked by ice at high altitude, therefore giving a certain discrepancy in the readings that the pilot and copilot would see.

Oh, we have an enormous way to go yet.
